author: Staff Reporter
text:
Urging Chettipalayam Town Panchayat to fund construction of a railway station, members of Marumalarchi Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (MDMK) led by their party’s State Youth Wing Secretary, V. Eswaran, picketed the Town Panchayat office recently. The Chettipalayam station was razed as part of the gauge conversion of the Pollachi to Podanur meter gauge track. Mr. Eswaran said that following repeated representations and demonstrations, the railways sanctioned construction of a halting station. “The railway authorities worked out the estimate for establishing the station at Rs. 49.20 lakh,” he said.

He said the railways had stated that the funds for the same should be mobilised by the local body. “Though the sanction was given in November 2014, the local body is yet to take efforts for establishing the station,” he said.
title: Demonstration held
